2.title: Part Two
2.plot: New to ZZ Swipe, Ashley has just finished her first experience with an "okay" guy. She definitely enjoyed herself, but that doesn't mean she's not still on the prowl for something even more satisfying. Unfortunately, all the messages she's been getting from men her own age having been disappointing. Undeterred, Ashley changes the age range for her matches and things start to really take off. Matching with Danny D, a sexy, older gentleman who's only in town for one night, Ashley takes a big risk and meets him at his hotel in nothing but sexy lingerie and a trench coat....

3.title: Part Three

She's got so many matches and so many dates booked that it's starting to get a little confusing. There's just so much good dick and so little time. Ashley goes to meet Michael (her date for the night) at a bar and stumbles upon Xander (returning for a second date with her).
